function.name: Constructor
function.description: Gets $_POST & $_GET and places it into class vars.

function.name: Optional Param
function.description: Get a param and if it doesn't exist return the default.

params.param: @param string $type Data type for input. String, int, float, double.
@param mixed $default Default value if param not set. (Optional)

function.return: @return mixed param value if set of default if set or null.

function.name: Required Param
function.description: Check if a POST/GET variable is set if not throw an exception.

params.param: @param string $type Data type for input. String, int, float, double.

function.return: @return value of param or throws CribzRequestException

function.name: Check Type
function.description: Check for a valid type and type cast the data to the type.

function.name: Get Param
function.description: Check to see if a GET param is set.
function.return: @return mixed the data from the GET param or false if not set.

function.name: Post Param
function.description: Check to see if a POST param is set.
function.return: @return mixed the data from the POST param or false if not set.
